```{=html}
<div class="signup-wrapper">
  <div class="signup-card">
    <h5 class="card-title">Mailing List</h5>
    <p class="card-subtitle">Join the mailing list for event updates. We do not share your information with any external parties.</p>

    <form id="signup-form">

      <label for="email">Email</label>
      <input id="email" name="email" type="email" required autocomplete="email">

      <label for="firstName">First Name</label>
      <input id="firstName" name="firstName" type="text" required autocomplete="given-name">

      <label for="lastName">Last Name</label>
      <input id="lastName" name="lastName" type="text" required autocomplete="family-name">

      <label for="affiliation">Affiliation</label>
      <input id="affiliation" name="affiliation" type="text" autocomplete="organization">
      <p class="card-subtitle">If you would like to be featured on the home page Members' Map, please fill out your affiliation! Additions to the map are anonymous, and we use a generic address associated with your institution.  </p>

      <button type="submit">Sign Up</button>
    </form>

    <div id="signup-msg" aria-live="polite"></div>
  </div>
</div>

<script>
  const WEB_APP_URL =
    "https://script.google.com/macros/s/AKfycbz_JkgiIFZNZlUv1OHENZJJvqQbEyRB3azFXZNKuaKwuYc_tNAPGgmDpPmsRhLLDBE/exec";

  const form = document.getElementById("signup-form");
  const msg  = document.getElementById("signup-msg");

  form.addEventListener("submit", async (e) => {
    e.preventDefault();
    msg.textContent = "Submitting…";

    const payload = {
      email:       document.getElementById("email").value.trim(),
      firstName:   document.getElementById("firstName").value.trim(),
      lastName:    document.getElementById("lastName").value.trim(),
      affiliation: document.getElementById("affiliation").value.trim()
    };

    try {
      await fetch(WEB_APP_URL, {
        method: "POST",
        mode: "no-cors",
        headers: { "Content-Type": "application/json" },
        body: JSON.stringify(payload)
      });
      form.reset();
      msg.textContent = "Thanks! You're on the list.";
    } catch (err) {
      console.error(err);
      msg.textContent = "Sorry—something went wrong. Please try again.";
    }
  });
</script>
```
